 Workdone:

 We decided to go ahead and redo Video & Audio all over. We started with video and rotated and fix CAM movement in the beginning. Lower contrast, adjusted levels, saturation, HQ smoother, and Resharpen. The main reason for us redoing this was to add subtitles. Never done it before so I had to do some research in how to make an .SRT file. What took the most time was we had to watch the whole movie and get the italian subs/exact time and uses my language text translation to get english subs. Not sure if its perfect...but im sure its good enough.

 Audio:
 Well this was another project...LOL. I've been searching the net in finding the best program for cleaning up CAM audio. I found a really nice one and havent master it yet...but spent at least 8 hours getting CAM audio to the best sounding overall. Its still cam... So dont expect it to sound like line and it doesn't look like we getting any this week from sources. Spents around 16 hours on this... and I believe to be the best to date ALL AROUND. So take it or leave
